did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Jefferson African American Heritage Center Family Photo Day FlipBook, (6 October 1909- 24 May 1919) 2019
did.origination: Jefferson School African American Heritage Center

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jefferson African American Heritage Center Family Photo Day FlipBook, Collection number , Albemarle Charlottesville Historical Society

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: These portraits are the work of Rufus W. Holsinger, a Charlottesville photographer who worked from the 1890's through his death in 1931. March 9, 2019- Family Photo Day hosted by Jefferson African American Heritage Center, where local residents could view photos in the Holsinger collection and identify and provide more information about the people in the photos.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The photos are organized in 8 volumes of flipbooks, in alphabetical order*

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: *Order is based on entries in Holsinger's business ledgers for payment (the name therefore may not be the name of the subject in the photo, rather just who paid for the photo).

controlaccess.head: Corporate Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Jefferson African American Heritage Center(Charlottesvilla, Va.
